resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102918</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102918</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207070</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Benjamin Franklin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Benjamin Franklin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Benjamin Franklin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Benjamin Franklin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Benjamin Franklin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Ψενιαμην Franklin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Benjamin Franklin</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">explores Franklin's life as a writer, inventor, diplomat, businessman, musician, scientist, humorist, civic leader, international celebrity, abolitionist, and genius. It includes information on his experiments, role as a founding father, his diplomatic work, and his community work. Lesson plans, a timeline, interactive science experiments, a kite building exercise, and other resources are also available.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erforscht das Leben Franklins als Verfasser, 
Erfinder, Diplomat, Geschäftsmann, Musiker, Wissenschaftler, 
Humorist, bürgerlicher Führer, internationale Berühmtheit, 
abolitionist und Genie. Es schließt Informationen über seine 
Experimente, Rolle als gründenvater, seine diplomatische Arbeit und 
seine Gemeinschaftsarbeit ein. Lektionpläne, ein timeline, 
interaktive Wissenschaft Experimente, eine Drachengebäudeübung und 
andere Betriebsmittel sind auch vorhanden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">explore la vie de Franklin's en tant qu'un auteur, 
un inventeur, un diplomate, un homme d'affaires, un musicien, un 
scientifique, un humoriste, une amorce civique, une célébrité 
internationale, un abolitionniste, et génie. Elle inclut 
l'information sur ses expériences, le rôle en tant que père de 
fondation, son travail diplomatique, et son travail de la communauté.
Les plans de leçon, une chronologie, les expériences 
interactives de la science, un exercice de bâtiment de cerf-volant, 
et d'autres ressources sont également disponibles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">explora a vida de Franklin como um escritor, um 
inventor, um diplomata, um homem de negócios, um músico, um 
cientista, um humorist, um condutor civil, uma celebridade 
internacional, um abolitionist, e um gênio. Inclui a 
informação em suas experiências, o papel como um pai fundando, seu 
trabalho diplomatic, e seu trabalho da comunidade. As plantas da
lição, um timeline, as experiências interativas da ciência, um 
exercício do edifício do kite, e outros recursos estão também 
disponíveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esplora la vita del Franklin come un produttore, un
inventore, un diplomatico, un uomo d'affari, un musicista, uno 
scienziato, un humorist, un capo civico, un celebrity 
internazionale, un abolitionist e genius. Include le 
informazioni sui suoi esperimenti, il ruolo come padre fondante, il 
suo lavoro diplomatico ed il suo lavoro della Comunità. I 
programmi di lezione, un timeline, gli esperimenti interattivi di 
scienza, un'esercitazione della costruzione del cervo volante ed altre
risorse sono egualmente disponibili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ερευνά τη ζωή Franklin ως συγγραφέα, εφευρέτη, 
διπλωμάτη, επιχειρηματία, μουσικό, επιστήμονα, ευθυμογράφο, 
πολιτικό ηγέτη, διεθνή προσωπικότητα, ρεφορμιστή, και 
μεγαλοφυία. Περιλαμβάνει τις πληροφορίες για τα πειράματά 
του, το ρόλο ως ιδρύοντας πατέρα, τη διπλωματική εργασία του, και
την κοινοτική εργασία του. Τα σχέδια μαθήματος, μια 
υπόδειξη ως προς το χρόνο, διαλογικά πειράματα επιστήμης, μια 
άσκηση οικοδόμησης ικτίνων, και άλλα στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς 
είναι επίσης διαθέσιμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">explora la vida de Franklin como un programa de 
escritura, un inventor, un diplomata, un hombre de negocios, un 
músico, un científico, un humorista, un arranque de cinta cívico, 
una celebridad internacional, un abolitionist, y genio. Incluye 
la información sobre sus experimentos, el papel como padre de 
fundación, su trabajo diplomático, y su trabajo de la comunidad. 
Los planes de la lección, un timeline, los experimentos 
interactivos de la ciencia, un ejercicio del edificio de la cometa, y 
otros recursos están también disponibles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207070</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102918</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/benjamin-franklin</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
